name: pressure

effect.black-white: Does not affect friendly Pokémon's moves that target all other Pokémon. This ability's presence is not announced upon entering battle.
effect.black-2-white-2: Does not affect friendly Pokémon's moves that target all other Pokémon. This ability's presence is not announced upon entering battle.

short_effect: Increases the PP cost of moves targetting the Pokémon by one.

flavor_text.black-white: The Pokémon raises the foe’s PP usage.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The Pokémon raises the foe’s PP usage.
